0: Handy gated parking next to hotel nice short walk to lobby
Coffee in the lobby store was great and no charge
Very clean accommodations quit room great location at a good price
The refreshed feel of a modern hotel in an older town is only reinforced by the sweet updated gym with decent weights
Excellent service and nice lobby but the rooms need an update
The lobby was very inviting and clean and warm chocolate chip cookies awaited
The rooms staff and amenities at a great price
I enjoyed my stay at this facility and would recommend it to anyone traveling in Chattanooga
Great facility in a great location
Overall good hotel with good amenities for the price
1: 2 elevators for the hotel had to service 13 floors and sometimes the wait was 10 minutes
Only negatives were that the elevators took forever
The only downside was the hotel was crowded this weekend with a conference so getting an open elevator was almost impossible
The rooms were clean and the beds comfortable but really nothing special or at least not too different from other hotels during the road trip which prices were much better with the same facilities
With everyoneguest checking out hotel workers ect using the one elevator it was not good at all
1 small working elevator at a property with 13 floors
There was usually a long wait for the elevator

Negatives 1 elevator working today and hotel employees ridding the elevator to go from 5th to 6th floor 2nd to 3rd etc while guests wait for elevator 8 mins
